Subclasses of AeBpelControllerBase in org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.graph.bpel.controller
 class AeBpelBandedContainerController
          Base controller for creating banded figures.
 class AeBpelChoiceContainerController
          Controller which creates and returns ChoiceContainerFigure as the content.
 class AeBpelChoicePartController
          Controller responsible for creating choice part figures such as Case, Otherwise, OnMessage, OnAlarm, Catch and CatchAll.
 class AeBpelContainerActivityController
          The AeBpelContainerActivityController creates and returns figure that will be used for container type activies such as Flow, While.
 class AeBpelContainerController
          Base controller for BPEL container type definitions.
 class AeBpelContainerImplicitActivityController
          Controller which is responsible for creating implicit activity containers.
 class AeBpelIfElseActivityController
          The AeBpelIfElseActivityController creates "container" figure for the if-elseif-else parts.
 class AeBpelLinkController
          Controller which creates a link figure.
 class AeBpelMockController
          A simple controller used for testing.
 class AeBpelPickActivityController
          Controller tagged for BPEL Pick type activities.
 class AeBpelProcessRootController
          Controller which is the root controller for the BPEL process.
 class AeBpelScopeActivityController
          The AeBpelScopeActivityController reorders the child models so that the Activity type objects appear at the top of the model's child list.
 class AeBpelSequenceActivityController
          The AeBpelSequenceActivityController creates AeSequenceContainerFigure figure.
 class AeBpelSimpleActivityController
          Controller responsible for creating AeBpelSimpleActivityFigure.
 class AeBpelSwitchActivityController
          The AeBpelSwitchActivityController creates figure to Switch type activities.
